amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt a settlement agreement that directs funds to remediate the indirect harms caused by the manipulation of emission standards on automobiles.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 115-363 to exempt a settlement agreement that directs funds to remediate the indirect harms caused by the manipulation of emission standards on automobiles.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 235, 1 Present (Roll no. 576).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Johnson (GA).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 235, 1 Present (Roll no. 576).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
